H0.text: what was the religion in the virginia colony. Catholic

H1.text: what was the religion in the virginia colony. Puritan

H2.text: what was the religion in the virginia colony. Quaker

H3.text: what was the religion in the virginia colony. Anglican

A4.text: In 1619, the Anglican Church was formally established as the official Christian religion in the colony and would remain so until shortly after the American Revolution.

A5.text: All 26 churches with regular services in Virginia in 1650 were Anglican, which included all but 4 of the 30 Anglican churches in the colonies at the time (with the remainder located in Maryland).
